problem: My credit card payment was declined
solution: 1. Verify card details are correct (number, expiry, CVV). 2. Check if card has sufficient funds. 3. Ensure billing address matches card statement. 4. Try a different payment method. 5. Contact your bank if issue persists.

problem: I want a refund for my purchase
solution: 1. Confirm order number and purchase date. 2. Check refund eligibility (within 30 days, unused). 3. Initiate refund to original payment method. 4. Refund processes in 5-7 business days. 5. Send confirmation email.

problem: I was charged twice for the same order
solution: 1. Verify transaction history in system. 2. Confirm duplicate charge exists. 3. Initiate immediate refund for duplicate. 4. Apologize for inconvenience. 5. Offer 10% discount on next purchase.

problem: I want to cancel my subscription
solution: 1. Confirm customer identity and subscription. 2. Ask reason for cancellation (retention opportunity). 3. Offer pause option or downgrade. 4. If proceeding, cancel at end of billing cycle. 5. Confirm no future charges.

problem: I need a copy of my invoice
solution: 1. Verify customer account. 2. Locate invoice in system. 3. Send invoice via email. 4. Offer to explain any line items. 5. Provide invoice portal access instructions.

problem: The price charged is different from advertised
solution: 1. Verify advertised price (screenshot if available). 2. Check for applicable promotions/coupons. 3. If error confirmed, adjust charge immediately. 4. Apply price match guarantee. 5. Document for marketing review.

problem: I can't log into my account
solution: 1. Verify email/username is correct. 2. Check caps lock and keyboard language. 3. Initiate password reset via email. 4. Clear browser cache and cookies. 5. Try incognito mode or different browser.

problem: The mobile app keeps crashing
solution: 1. Check for app updates in store. 2. Restart the device. 3. Clear app cache and data. 4. Reinstall the app. 5. Check device compatibility. 6. Collect crash logs if issue persists.

problem: The website/app is very slow
solution: 1. Check internet connection speed. 2. Clear browser cache. 3. Disable browser extensions. 4. Try different network (WiFi vs mobile). 5. Check our status page for outages.

problem: A specific feature isn't functioning
solution: 1. Identify the exact feature and steps to reproduce. 2. Check if feature is available in user's plan. 3. Verify browser/app version compatibility. 4. Test in incognito mode. 5. Escalate to engineering if confirmed bug.

problem: My data isn't syncing across devices
solution: 1. Verify same account on all devices. 2. Check internet connectivity on each device. 3. Force sync in app settings. 4. Log out and log back in. 5. Check sync settings are enabled.

problem: I'm getting an error message
solution: 1. Note exact error code/message. 2. Check known issues database. 3. Provide specific fix for error. 4. Clear cache if generic error. 5. Collect logs for unknown errors.

problem: I need to update my personal information
solution: 1. Verify customer identity (security questions). 2. Identify what info needs updating. 3. Make changes in system. 4. Confirm changes with customer. 5. Send confirmation email.

problem: I want to delete my account
solution: 1. Verify customer identity. 2. Explain data retention policy. 3. Offer to export data first. 4. Process account deletion request. 5. Confirm 30-day grace period before permanent deletion.

problem: I think my account was hacked
solution: 1. Immediately reset password. 2. Enable two-factor authentication. 3. Review recent account activity. 4. Check for unauthorized changes. 5. Report suspicious transactions. 6. Consider escalating to security team.

problem: I need to verify my account
solution: 1. Send verification email/SMS. 2. Confirm customer receives code. 3. Enter code in system. 4. If no code received, check spam folder. 5. Resend or use alternative method.

problem: I forgot my password and can't reset it
solution: 1. Verify account email is accessible. 2. Check spam folder for reset email. 3. Try alternative reset methods (SMS, security questions). 4. Manual identity verification if needed. 5. Generate temporary password.

problem: Where is my order?
solution: 1. Get order number from customer. 2. Look up order in system. 3. Provide current shipping status. 4. Share tracking number and carrier link. 5. Estimate delivery date based on carrier info.

problem: My order arrived but an item is missing
solution: 1. Verify order details and items ordered. 2. Check if shipped in multiple packages. 3. Confirm missing item. 4. Reship missing item immediately. 5. Expedite shipping at no cost.

problem: I received the wrong item
solution: 1. Apologize for the error. 2. Verify what was ordered vs received. 3. Arrange return of wrong item (prepaid label). 4. Ship correct item immediately. 5. Offer 15% discount for inconvenience.

problem: My item arrived damaged
solution: 1. Express concern and apologize. 2. Request photos of damage. 3. Process immediate replacement or refund. 4. Arrange pickup of damaged item if needed. 5. Report to quality team.

problem: I want to cancel my order
solution: 1. Check order status (can only cancel if not shipped). 2. If not shipped, cancel and refund immediately. 3. If shipped, explain return process. 4. Initiate return if customer wants. 5. Confirm cancellation/return.

problem: I need to change delivery address
solution: 1. Check if order has shipped. 2. If not shipped, update address. 3. If shipped, contact carrier for redirect (may have fee). 4. Provide carrier contact info. 5. Confirm new address.

problem: How do I use this product?
solution: 1. Identify specific product. 2. Provide quick start guide. 3. Direct to video tutorials. 4. Offer step-by-step walkthrough. 5. Suggest knowledge base articles.

problem: Is this product compatible with...?
solution: 1. Identify customer's device/system. 2. Check compatibility matrix. 3. Provide clear yes/no answer. 4. Suggest alternatives if not compatible. 5. Share system requirements.

problem: I wish the product could do...
solution: 1. Thank customer for feedback. 2. Note the specific feature request. 3. Check if feature exists or is planned. 4. Log request in feedback system. 5. Explain how requests are reviewed.

problem: What's the difference between products?
solution: 1. Identify products to compare. 2. Highlight key differences. 3. Explain pricing tiers. 4. Recommend based on customer needs. 5. Offer trial if available.

problem: My order is delayed
solution: 1. Apologize for delay. 2. Check carrier tracking for issues. 3. Provide updated estimated delivery. 4. Offer free shipping on next order. 5. Escalate to logistics if severely delayed.

problem: Do you ship internationally?
solution: 1. Confirm international shipping availability. 2. Provide shipping rates for destination. 3. Explain customs/duties responsibility. 4. Estimate delivery time. 5. List any restricted items.

problem: I need faster shipping
solution: 1. Check available expedited options. 2. Provide upgrade costs. 3. If order not shipped, upgrade shipping. 4. If shipped, explain limitations. 5. Offer discount on upgrade fee.

problem: My package shows delivered but I didn't receive it
solution: 1. Verify delivery address and tracking. 2. Check with neighbors/building manager. 3. Look for delivery photo if available. 4. Wait 24 hours (sometimes marked early). 5. File claim and reship.

problem: My discount code isn't working
solution: 1. Verify exact code entered. 2. Check code validity (expiry, usage limits). 3. Confirm minimum purchase met. 4. Check product exclusions. 5. Apply manually if valid but technical issue.

problem: Can you match a competitor's price?
solution: 1. Verify competitor price (screenshot/link). 2. Check price match policy eligibility. 3. Confirm same product/model. 4. Apply price match if eligible. 5. Explain any exclusions.

problem: How do I use my loyalty points?
solution: 1. Check point balance. 2. Explain redemption options. 3. Apply points to order if requested. 4. Show point value conversion. 5. Explain how to earn more points.

problem: I want to give feedback about my experience
solution: 1. Thank customer for taking time. 2. Listen actively to feedback. 3. Note specifics (positive or negative). 4. Apologize if negative experience. 5. Log feedback and route appropriately.

problem: I want to speak to a manager
solution: 1. Acknowledge customer's request. 2. Attempt to resolve issue first. 3. If unresolved, warm transfer to supervisor. 4. Provide context to supervisor. 5. Follow up with customer.

problem: What are your store hours?
solution: Store hours: Monday-Friday 9AM-9PM, Saturday 10AM-8PM, Sunday 11AM-6PM. Holiday hours may vary. Check website for specific location hours.

problem: How can I contact you?
solution: Phone: 1-800-XXX-XXXX (9AM-9PM EST). Email: support@company.com. Live Chat: Available 24/7 on website. Social: @company on Twitter/Facebook.

problem: What is your return policy?
solution: 30-day return policy for unused items in original packaging. Electronics: 15 days. Final sale items non-returnable. Refund to original payment method within 5-7 business days.

problem: How do I return an item?
solution: 1. Log into account and go to Orders. 2. Select item to return. 3. Choose return reason. 4. Print prepaid shipping label. 5. Drop off at carrier location. 6. Refund processed upon receipt.

problem: I want to exchange for a different size/color
solution: 1. Check availability of desired item. 2. If available, initiate exchange. 3. Ship new item immediately. 4. Send return label for original. 5. No additional charge if same price.

problem: My product is defective and under warranty
solution: 1. Verify purchase date and warranty status. 2. Collect details about defect. 3. Request photos/videos of issue. 4. Approve warranty claim. 5. Send replacement or arrange repair.

problem: Can I extend my warranty?
solution: 1. Check current warranty status. 2. Provide extended warranty options. 3. Explain coverage differences. 4. Process purchase if customer agrees. 5. Send confirmation and updated terms.

problem: I want to know what data you have on me
solution: 1. Verify customer identity thoroughly. 2. Explain GDPR/CCPA rights. 3. Initiate data export request. 4. Provide within 30 days. 5. Explain data categories collected.

problem: Stop sending me marketing emails
solution: 1. Confirm email address. 2. Remove from marketing lists. 3. Explain may take 48 hours. 4. Confirm transactional emails will continue. 5. Provide preference center link.
